title.narrative: Educational and Social Reintegration of Persons Deprived of Liberty

description.narrative: The Social Rehabilitation System in Ecuador strives for the complete rehabilitation and societal reintegration of persons convicted of criminal activity. AVSI Ecuador, together with Cisco Networking Academy and the National Service of Integral Attention to Adult Persons Deprived of Liberty and Juvenile Offenders, is working to achieves that goal in the Regional Prison of Cotopaxi. Toward that end, persons deprived of liberty are trained in IT technologies, some have also become teachers who can train others thus maling the project sustainable over time. In addition, a videoconference center was created, so that people deprived of liberty can speak via video call with their relatives and friends, thus promoting family reintegration. Subsequent phases of the project include expanding the model throughoutthe country.
